titleStmt.title: H. T. Tomlinson to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2810

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
To his Excellensy
B. Magoffin Governor of the
State of Kentucky
Sir

I have been appointed by the Governors of nearly all the Western States as Commissioner of Deeds for the Several States in Missouri and respectfully solicit from your Excellency an appointment from the State of Kentucky as Commissioner of Deeds for that State resident in St Louis Mo. for my Character & qualifications I beg leave to refer you to James Trabue Esq and Mrss Quigley Lyons & Co Bankers at Louisville who know me as a member of the late firm of W H Barksdale & Co Bankers in this City

Missouri
Comr. of Deeds
H. T. Tomlinson
St Louis
